biotools.summary:
pedigree drawing with ease.

A simple python script to draw (complex and multi generation!) pedigrees with graphviz.

ped_draw reads in a ped file (from a specified file or from /dev/stdin) and generates a dot file (to stdout). The subsequent dot output can be piped directly to dot/graphviz to generate png, svg, pdf, ps, or any other image option available in the graphviz documentation.

bioschemas.name: ped_draw
